text: velev enne kur'anen suyyirat bihi-lcibalu ev kutti`at bihi-l'ardu ev kullime bihi-lmevta. bel lillahi-l'emru cemi`a. efelem yey'esi-llezine amenu el lev yesau-llahu lehede-nnase cemi`a. vela yezalu-llezine keferu tusibuhum bima sane`u kari`atun ev tehullu karibem min darihim hatta ye'tiye va`du-llah. inne-llahe la yuhlifu-lmi`ad
